comment.author: 23666168@N04
comment._content: Looks like there a small motor attached to this bike. An early version of the moped maybe?

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content:
Hi Paris-Roubaix,

Nice catch on the motor! I checked with the curator from the National Postal Museum and she believes that the 1890 date associated with the image is an approximate date, so it could very well be an early example of a motorbike.

Cheers,
Effie, Smithsonian Institution Archives

comment.author: 23666168@N04
comment._content: Hello Effie, thanks very much to the Smithsonian Institution for adding the photograph to our group and thanks also to you for the additional information on it. It's a great image of past times.
